content.rendered:
Directed by Anup Bhandari

Written by Anup Bhandari. Anup Bhandari. John Mahendran. Anup Bhandari. Sanjay Upadhyay. Rajshri Sudhakar

Star Sudeep(Vikrant Rona (as Kichcha Sudeepa)). Nirup Bhandari(Sanju aka Sanjeev Gambhira). Neetha Ashok(Panna aka Aparna Ballal). Jacqueline Fernandez(Gadang Rakkamma aka Raquel D’Costa). Milana Nagaraj(Renu aka Renu Rona). Siddu Moolimani(Munna aka Mohanchandra Ballal). Karthik Rao Kordale(Pakru aka Fakruddin (as Karthik Rao)). Madhusudhan Rao(Janardhan Gambhira). Samhitha(Guddi aka Geethanjali Rona). Anup Bhandari(Photographer). Ramesh Rai Kukkuvalli(Eknath aka Eknath Gambhira (as Ramesh Kukkuvalli)). Vajradheer Jain(Pinto aka Lawrence Pinto). Ranjan Shetty(Bhavikatti aka Rudramani Bavikatte). Priya V(Shaku aka Shakuntala Gambhira). Ravishankar Gowda(Vishwanath aka Vishwanath Ballal). Chitkala Biradar(Baby aka Baby Ballal). Dushyant Rai(Moose Kunni). Vishwanath K C(Manche Gowda (as Vishwa)). Ramm Bogadi(Mahabala (as Ramm)). Vasuki Vaibhav(Balu / Baalu aka Balakrishna). Veliappan(Podiyajja). Yogish Shetty(Nittoni). Geetha(Gurbi). Athish Shetty(Raghava (as Atish)). Shreyas Pethri(Madhava (as Shreyas)). Majur Achinthya Puranik(Young Sanju (as Achintya)). Aditya(Young Rona). Nikhith(Rapeek). Sudheer Hebri(Bully Boys (as Sudeer Hebri)). Yogish Kotian(Maila). Shankar Narayan(Balu Dad). Sudhakar Bhandari(Janakiram (as Sudhakar Saaja)). Dilip(Rakesh). Venkatesh(Rakesh Dad). Sareesh Narayan(Boatman Keshava). Suraj Kiran(Young Janardhan). Santhosh Poojary Panapila(Bully Boys (as Santhosh Poojari)). Anupama(Rakesh Mom). Baby Aaradhya(Teaser Kid (as Aradhya)). Sound Basava(Old Inspector). Krishna Pavan Gayatri(Teaser Kid). Nishka Bhandari(Teaser Kid). Suma(Deyyu). Thejas(Teaser Kid). Hanumakka(Deyyu). Mahesh(Ferry Goon). Ninadh Pandit(Teaser Kid). Prarthana(Teaser Kid). Srikanth(Ferry Goon). Khushi(Huts Child). Vali Prakash(Children Dad). Jaya(Maila Wife)

Language Kannada

Producers Jack Manju. Shalini Manjunath. Alankar Pandian

Production Shalini Artss. Kichcha Creatiions
